sent.orig: Conclusion RSM might play a neuroprotective role through regulating ICE expression during cerebral ischemia and reperfusion.
sent.trans: 结论 丹参可能通过调节ICE ,进而发挥治疗脑缺血的作用。

sent.orig: Frankfurt station and the pride of German, ICE train.
sent.trans: 法兰克福火车站和德国的骄傲，ICE火车。

sent.orig: When water is cooled below 0 degrees Celsius, it freezes and becomes ice.
sent.trans: 水冷却(cool)到0摄氏度以下时， 冻结(freeze)成冰(ice)。

sent.orig: The establishment of ICE Shanghai Graduate &Student Committee was another achievement in our session.
sent.trans: 我们这届委员的另一项成就是成立ICE上海学生委员会。

sent.orig: Apoptosis is controlled by many genes,including Bcl-2 family members,p53,Fas and FasL,ced,c-myc, ICE etc.
sent.trans: 已发现多种基因参与细胞凋亡的基因调控，其中包括Bcl-2和Bax、p53、Fas和FasL、ced、c-myc、ICE等。 本文就主要凋亡基因对细胞凋亡的调控进行了综述。
